0.1.name: wordpress/auto-read-more-generator
0.1.description: This plugin will put a "Read More..." link for each post of the blog page after the first image and the first paragraph. If no image present at the beginning, it will only show the first paragraph and the read more link after that.

1.0.name: wordpress/auto-read-more-generator
1.0.description: This plugin will put a "Read More..." link for each post of the blog page after the first image and the first paragraph. If no image present at the beginning, it will only show the first paragraph and the read more link after that.
